children.description:
Semantic form override. If developer wants to override auto-generated form,
it should be placed inside <ontodia-entity-metadata>.

enableOntodiaContextFields.description:
Enable extending the list of fields using the fields where the xsdDatatype is to xsd:anyURI in the ontodia-field-configuration 
This is useful for controlling the form generated but enabling all the other connections available for those entity types.

entityTypeIri.description: Iri of the type to be configured. For example, 'http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/person'

fields.description:
Ordered list of fields to be used for this entity. Automatically generated forms will honor
the order of the fields specified here.

imageIri.description: Field Iri for entity image override

labelIri.description: Field Iri for entity label override

newSubjectTemplate.description: Subject template override for generating Iri of new entities
